authorInfo.title: About the Author
authorInfo.description: Jessica Park is a digital transformation consultant specializing in organizational change management and technology adoption strategies.

materialsUsed: Kotter, J. (2012). Leading Change. Harvard Business Review Press.
Rogers, E. (2003). Diffusion of Innovations. Free Press.
Westerman, G. (2014). Leading Digital. Harvard Business Review Press.
MIT Sloan Management Review (2023). "Digital Transformation Success" - Technology Management Quarterly.

keyTakeaways.title: Key Takeaways
keyTakeaways.description: Digital transformation requires strong leadership, clear vision, and employee buy-in. Focus on change management and continuous learning to ensure successful technology adoption.

emails.subject: Digital Transformation Roadmap: From Legacy to Leading Edge
emails.preview: Dear Technology Leader, digital transformation is more than just adopting new tools—it's about fundamentally changing how your organization operates and delivers value...

highlight.title: Digital Transformation Framework
highlight.description: Complete roadmap with change management strategies and technology adoption best practices
